title: Node.js, the PHP killer
content: So glad I don't have to work with PHP anymore. Node and now deno are the best. Javascript for lyfe.

title: Comparison of SQL databases
content: mySQL: open-source horizontal scalibilty. Oracle: proprietary, PostgreSQL: better for 'distributed SQL'

title: Git Commit: a learning in git flow
content: Wow, what a head ache. We have all been there when merge conflict hell arises from the depths after a particularly long coding session...
